title: Create ServiceAccount
description: Create a ServiceAccount named ||app-sa|| in Namespace ||production|| and create a Pod named ||sa-pod|| that uses this ServiceAccount.

steps: kubectl run sa-pod --image=nginx:1.21 --serviceaccount=app-sa -n production --dry-run=client -o yaml > sa-pod.yaml

validations.command: kubectl get serviceaccount app-sa -n production -o jsonpath='{.metadata.name}'
kubectl get pod sa-pod -n production -o jsonpath='{.spec.serviceAccountName}'
